item.title: Web Performance Made Easy
item.description: Web performance made easy! The web has made great progress in enabling fast experiences, but building a fast site today isnâ€™t trivial. At Google, we analyze a lot of sites and have learned what makes them load quickly and run smoothly. In this talk, learn how to find and fix the most common web performance bottlenecks to improve your UX by using tools like Lighthouse and DevTools, and discover the latest browser APIs (e.
